A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Star Wars movie is something entirely different than any other movie and is completely unpredictable. The main reason that this movie is disliked is also because it's different and unpredictable. I think the movie is great but I can see all the flaws in this movie as well. And the fact of the matter is that this has the same response and attitude toward it as Empire Strikes Back\, that movie also divided fans and they also didn't think it was the best because of its different approach but now look at it\, The supposed best in the series.
